name: Bellus Battle
description:
Bellus Battle is a fast-paced couch free for all game that takes place in an arena, the aim is to be the last one standing. Players are able to pick up weapons with different attributes. The game has a round based scoring system. The last player standing wins the round, after this you will move on to the next map and this cycle continues until someone has accumulated enough points to win the game!


Find a variety of weapons on different levels to eliminate your friends from the battlefield!


There are plenty of hats available that you and your friends can choose from to show off your style. Everything from knights to hamburgers!
